params.sarcoId: ID of sarcophagus archaeologist has attempted to publish a share on

params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed clean attempt
params.embalmerClaimWindowEnd: Latest time an embalmer may claim residual locked bonds the sarcophagus: resurrectionTime + gracePeriod + embalmerClaimWindow

params.sarcoId: ID of sarcophagus archaeologist has attempted to publish a share on

params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed clean attempt
params.embalmerClaimWindowEnd: Latest time an embalmer may claim residual locked bonds the sarcophagus: resurrectionTime + gracePeriod + embalmerClaimWindow

params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed clean attempt
params.publishDeadline: Latest time an archaeologist may publish a key share on a sarcophagus: esurrectionTime + gracePeriod

params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed publish attempt
params.resurrectionTime: Time after which the sarcophagus can be resurrected

params.currentTime: Timestamp of the failed publish attempt
params.publishDeadline: Time after which the sarcophagus can no longer be resurrected  (resurrectionTime + gracePeriod)

params.privateKey: The private key the archaeologist is publishing
params.sarcoId: The identifier of the sarcophagus to unwrap

params.freeBond: How much bond the archaeologist wants to deposit during the register call (if any)
params.maximumRewrapInterval: The longest interval of time from a rewrap time the arch will accept for a resurrection
params.minimumDiggingFee: The archaeologist's minimum amount to accept for a digging fee
params.peerId: The libp2p identifier for the archaeologist

params.maximumRewrapInterval: The longest interval of time from a rewrap time the arch will accept for a resurrection freeBond How much bond the archaeologist wants to deposit during the update call (if any)
params.minimumDiggingFee: The archaeologist's minimum amount to accept for a digging fee
params.peerId: The libp2p identifier for the archaeologist

ArchaeologistHasBeenAccused(address,byte.notice: An archaeologist that has already been accused has attempted to publish a key share

EmbalmerClaimWindowPassed(uint256,uint25.notice: Embalmer has attempted to clean a sarcophagus after the embalmerClaimWindow has passed

SarcophagusAlreadyCleaned(bytes32).notice: Clean has been called on a sarcophagus that has already been cleaned

SenderNotEmbalmerOrAdmin(address).notice: Clean has been called by someone other than the admin or embalmer of the sarcophagus

TooEarlyForAdminClean(uint256,uint256).notice: Admin has attempted to clean a sarcophagus before the embalmerClaimWindow has passed

TooEarlyForClean(uint256,uint256).notice: Clean has been called before the deadline for archaeologists to publish key shares has passed

TooEarlyForPublish(uint256,uint256).notice: Archaeologist has attempted to publish a keyshare before the resurrection time

TooLateForPublish(uint256,uint256).notice: Archaeologist has attempted to publish a keyshare after the end of the resurrection window

depositFreeBond(uint256).notice: Deposits an archaeologist's free bond to the contract.

publishPrivateKey(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Publishes the private key for which the archaeologist is responsible during the sarcophagus resurrection window. Pays digging fees to the archaeologist and releases their locked bond. Cannot be called on a compromised or buried sarcophagus.

withdrawFreeBond(uint256).notice: Withdraws an archaeologist's free bond from the contract.

withdrawReward().notice: Withdraws all rewards from an archaeologist's reward pool
